summary: Crypto-related stocks are rising after days of losses, tracking traditional markets higher.
title: Coinbase, Silvergate reverse losses to rise alongside traditional markets
content: Crypto-related stocks are rising after days of losses, tracking traditional markets higher.
Coinbase and Silvergate were up more than 3% at 10:40 a.m. ET, while Galaxy Digital added nearly 5%.
The S&P 500 and Nasdaq rose about 0.5% each.
